articles.author: Ivan Stewart Saldajeno
articles.title: Meralco takes pivotal semis lead vs. Magnolia - pna.gov.ph
articles.description: MANILA – Meralco took a commanding 2-1 lead in its PBA Governors' Cup semifinal series against Magnolia with a 101-95 Game 3 on Sunday night at the Mall of Asia Arena in Pasay City.The Bolts endured a late comeback by the Hotshots to preserve a stellar third-…
articles.content:
MANILA – Meralco took a commanding 2-1 lead in its PBA Governors' Cup semifinal series against Magnolia with a 101-95 Game 3 on Sunday night at the Mall of Asia Arena in Pasay City.
The Bolts endure… [+1747 chars]
